name: collaborate
posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

dsense.name: collaborate
dsense.posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

trans_examp.trans_en: to work with someone else for a special purpose

example.eg: Two writers collaborated on the script for the film.
example.egtrans: 两位作家合写了这部电影的剧本。

example.eg: A German company collaborated with a Swiss firm to develop the product.
example.egtrans: 一家德国公司与一家瑞士小公司合作开发该产品。

example.eg: The British and Italian police collaborated in catching the terrorists.
example.egtrans: 英国警方和意大利警方通力合作，抓住了恐怖分子。

dsense.name: collaborate
dsense.posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

trans_examp.trans_en: to work with an enemy who has taken control of your own country

example.eg: Anyone who was suspected of collaborating with the occupying forces was arrested.
example.egtrans: 任何涉嫌与占领军勾结的人都被逮捕了。
